name: part_003
file: tmp_【#兎田ぺこら生誕祭2025】生誕3D LIVE！FEVER！！！！！！！ぺこ！【ホロライブ⧸兎田ぺこら】 [uB6GxHc7PRc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Pekora, Fuwawa, and Mococo perform the song 'Luminous'.
A slot machine-themed mini-game segment featuring Pekora.
Pekora and Polka perform the song 'Tatakai no Uta' (Song of Battle).

subtitles.original: ...不安はまだ続くけど
subtitles.english: ...the anxiety still continues, but

subtitles.original: 君がいれば
subtitles.english: if you're here

subtitles.original: 少しは強くなれる気がして
subtitles.english: I feel like I can become a little stronger

subtitles.original: 明日の色を重ねた
subtitles.english: Layering the colors of tomorrow

subtitles.original: 呼んだ希望辿って 止めた世界を超えた
subtitles.english: Tracing the hope I called for, I crossed the stopped world

subtitles.original: 諦めない想いいつしか心繋げた
subtitles.english: Unyielding feelings eventually connected our hearts

subtitles.original: 泣いていたって笑って 明日迎えに行こう
subtitles.english: Even if we were crying, let's smile and go meet tomorrow

subtitles.original: 決めた誓い辛くて倒れても
subtitles.english: Even if the oath I made is painful and I fall

subtitles.original: 君のココロを 守るため
subtitles.english: To protect your heart

subtitles.original: 記憶のない時の流れに
subtitles.english: In the flow of time without memories

subtitles.original: きっと求めていた温かさはあって
subtitles.english: The warmth I surely sought was there

subtitles.original: 包まれた瞬間全ての
subtitles.english: In the moment I was enveloped, all of

subtitles.original: 思いは君へ巡る
subtitles.english: My thoughts go out to you

subtitles.original: 空に向かって走り手にした
subtitles.english: Running toward the sky, I took hold of it

subtitles.original: いくつもの遠い光胸にしまって
subtitles.english: Storing many distant lights in my chest

subtitles.original: 私の中の輝きに変え
subtitles.english: Changing them into a brilliance within me

subtitles.original: 迷いを全部払ってとぼう
subtitles.english: Brushing away all hesitation, let's fly

subtitles.original: 正解の見えない入り組んだ迷路を抜け
subtitles.english: Escaping the intricate maze with no visible answer

subtitles.original: 君が流した涙で心目覚めた
subtitles.english: My heart woke up through the tears you shed

subtitles.original: そして知った世界はこんなにもまだ綺麗で
subtitles.english: And the world I learned about is still so beautiful

subtitles.original: 新しい可能性を生むだろう
subtitles.english: It will surely give birth to new possibilities

subtitles.original: 時のカケラの願いから
subtitles.english: From the wish of a fragment of time

subtitles.original: 救い信じては揺れた想い
subtitles.english: Believe in salvation, the swaying feelings

subtitles.original: 私が始まりに立って
subtitles.english: As I stand at the beginning

subtitles.original: 君の笑顔取り戻すよ
subtitles.english: I'll take back your smile

subtitles.original: 真実の奇跡になって
subtitles.english: Becoming a true miracle

subtitles.original: 呼んだ希望辿って 止めた世界を超えた
subtitles.english: Tracing the hope I called for, I crossed the stopped world

subtitles.original: 諦めない想いいつしか心繋げた
subtitles.english: Unyielding feelings eventually connected our hearts

subtitles.original: 泣いていたって笑って 明日迎えに行こう
subtitles.english: Even if we were crying, let's smile and go meet tomorrow

subtitles.original: 決めた誓い辛くて倒れても
subtitles.english: Even if the oath I made is painful and I fall

subtitles.original: 君のココロを 守るため
subtitles.english: To protect your heart

subtitles.original: 君の
subtitles.english: I'll stay

subtitles.original: 側にいよう
subtitles.english: by your side

subtitles.original: 野うさぎタワーをやっつける!
subtitles.english: Defeat the Nousagi Tower!

subtitles.original: 押せ!!
subtitles.english: Press!!

subtitles.original: 必殺
subtitles.english: Finishing Move

subtitles.original: おらーでぺこー！
subtitles.english: Oraa de peko-!

subtitles.original: スーパーぺこらBONUS
subtitles.english: Super Pekora BONUS

subtitles.original:
闘いの詩
作詞：三本葎　作曲：THE NEUTRAL
subtitles.english:
Song of Battle
Lyrics: Sanbon Mugura / Composition: THE NEUTRAL

subtitles.original: GET UP GET DOWN 闘いの時
subtitles.english: GET UP GET DOWN, time for battle

subtitles.original: 脆弱な心のままに
subtitles.english: Remaining as a fragile heart

subtitles.original: GO TO NIGHT NOW すべてかけて
subtitles.english: GO TO NIGHT NOW, risking everything

subtitles.original: 守るべきものがあるはず
subtitles.english: There must be something to protect

subtitles.original: 一人で生きてく そんな言葉に
subtitles.english: Living alone, in those words...
